entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 27 except 31 near Osoyoos.

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 40%
